forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this morning becoming less numerous during the afternoon hours. High 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers this evening with overcast skies overnight. Low 42F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
